content.question: Which of the following best explains why Massachusetts Bay officials banished Anne Hutchinson?

choices.label: She challenged gender roles and Puritan orthodoxy.
She was found guilty of practicing witchcraft.
She preached the doctrine of predestination.
She gave birth to a child out of wedlock.

content.answer: She challenged gender roles and Puritan orthodoxy.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
